Start playing early with the alpha version and be part of the Foundation Year 2016. You will be able to create your own character and portrait, plus you will be able to request one item based on a photograph you provide. The portrait (and your name) will also appear in the Retropolis Academy of Art Yearbook as one of its prominent first students.  Note: custom items will be produced over the whole Foundation Year, but it will be ready at least before the final class photo is taken.
